name: Horologium: Constellation Of Clocks
description:
Friendship and murders.

This is a visual novel that tells the story of a night at the Academy of arts, where your actions depend on whether you and your friends will live to see the morning.

Features:

- Fully playable English and Russian versions

- Completely original soundtrack and art 

- 5 endings, one of which is true

- Plot in the spirit of the anime "When the Cicadas Cry" and " Stein's Gate"

Warning: the game contains scenes of violence and mature language.

The game also contains a number of early endings, where the protagonist dies, save more often.
